Name: Rainyday
About the game: Rainyday is a gritty and atmospheric, top-down, old school detective adventure about human trafficking inspired by Sierra's classics and 1990s masterpieces like Dreamweb, Harvester, Bloodnet etc. Take the role of John Rainy. An ageing, tired and depressed NOPD detective investigating strange child disappearances in the city of New Orleans. Jump in and descent into the dark, grim world of Rainyday, where superstitious beliefs prevail and the evil of man knows no limits. Purchasing this product will grant access to ALL four episodes. Episode Release Dates: Prologue Episode *RELEASED* Episode 1: Gris-gris *RELEASED* Episode 2: Kids *RELEASED* Episode 3: From the Abyss *RELEASED*
